title: Emerald & Polki Diamond Vanki Necklace - Shobha Haaram
features: A stunning Vanki style necklace featuring a floral motif with emeralds and polki diamonds. The necklace has a central pendant of a slightly smaller floral motif which is also decorated by emeralds and uncut diamonds. The design is inspired by traditional Vanki armlets, adapted into a necklace. Features a delicate branch-like structure connecting the two floral pieces, highlighting the setting of the pear-shaped diamonds. The setting is designed to maximize the brilliance of the polki diamonds and the vibrant green of the emeralds.
colors: and White (from the Polki Diamonds). The gold provides a warm
traditional backdrop enhancing the vibrancy of the green emeralds and the subtle shine of the polki.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like Seemantham
and Muhurtham. Also suitable for formal evening events where you want to showcase a blend of tradition and modern elegance.
description: This unique Vanki Haaram is a modern take on a classic South Indian design. The combination of vibrant emeralds and uniquely shaped polki diamonds creates a statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regal sophistication. A testament to impeccable craftsmanship and timeless design, offering both cultural significance and enduring value.
